div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: '2210/7107 Abschrift versandt: 19/X.1879' [Copy sent 19 October 1879].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. med. et phil. Ferd. Baron von Müller Mr F D H. Governments Botanist, d. Z. Stiftsrath des freien Deutschen Hochstiftens Melbourne (Victoria. Australien)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendung vom (Poststempel Se. 3) d. J. mit welcher Sie so gütig waren, uns Ihren Eucalyptographia etc. First and Second Decade als abermaligen hocherfreulichen Beweis Ihren ernstlichen ruhmvoll Thätigkeit und zugleich Ihren freundlichern Antheilnahme an unser Besten danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. med. and phil. Ferd. Baron von Mueller Mr.F.D.H.
Meister des Freies Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Government Botanist, at present Councillor of the Freies Deutsches Hochstift. Melbourne (Victoria, Australia)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 18 Wine-month
i.e. October. 1879

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (postmarked Se 3
3 September.
) this year with which you were so kind as [to send] us your Eucalyptographia etc. First and Second Decade
B79.13.11. as repeated highly welcome proof of your earnest glorious activity and at the same time your kind interest in our welfare, we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our Academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
Dr. A. P.
Dr Adolf Petermann.
